attributes.action: Change the slavery law to stop immigration destroying our country.
attributes.additional_details: This country is on its knees. The people are angry and civil war will come if you do not take heed of our demands and constant protests against this government. Call a GE or do what we want which is why your in power on the first case.
attributes.background: We want the government to stand down and call a GE. BUT.... you won't do that so we want all EU LAWS removed. All slavery laws removed or changed to stop immigration immediately. And all illegal immigrants removed.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure what laws you'd like removed or changed.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
